Tooltip: this activity creates a new queue in the specified folder. If no folder is provided, then it creates one in the current folder.

Arguments.Name: Folder
Arguments.Tooltip: Folder to search for queues. If not specified, uses the current folder that the process is running within.

Arguments.Name: Encrypted
Arguments.Tooltip: Set to True if you want the Queue to encrypt all Queue Items. Default is False.

Arguments.Name: QueueName
Arguments.Tooltip: Name for the Queue to be created

Arguments.Name: QueueDescription
Arguments.Tooltip: Description for the queue to be created
